HomePage.title: Hello!

errors.camera_access_required: You need to grant camera access. Please enable permissions in browser settings and reload the page.

HomePage.layout_tips_content: Choose your favorite photos and customize the frame by selecting a solid color or gradient to create the perfect photo strip. Use the color picker to fine-tune. When satisfied, press the Download button below.
HomePage.sticker_tips_content: Choose from pre-designed sticker layouts or add personal stickers to customize your photo. Stickers will be included in the final download file.
HomePage.scan_content: Scan this QR code with your phone camera to instantly view and download your creation
